name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Python Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience adept in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **microservices** architecture. Proficient in building RESTful and gRPC APIs and skilled in leveraging **OpenAPI** for API design. Expertise in **Docker**, **Docker Compose**, and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration of applications, ensuring scalable and maintainable deployments. Strong background in developing and deploying **Machine Learning** solutions, with hands-on experience in using **GenAI**, **LangChain**, and **LangGraph** to create intelligent applications.

Experienced in implementing CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions**, AWS tools including **AWS CodePipeline**, and infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **CDK**. Committed to version control, thorough testing, and code reviews to ensure high-quality software delivery. Proven record in delivering high-performance software solutions within healthcare and finance sectors, driving real-world impact through technology. Passionate about developing compliant solutions that meet standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring seamless deployments and promoting **testing** through automated pipelines for continuous integration.
• Engaged in **code reviews** to maintain high-quality standards and foster collaboration among teams, focusing on enhancing code maintainability.

• Employed **Docker Compose** and **Kubernetes** orchestration to manage containerized applications, enhancing scalability and reliability.

• Regularly conducted performance tuning and optimization for existing applications, achieving a **30% increase** in response times through improved algorithms and data handling.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver frequent updates and enhancements based on Agile methodologies, achieving a **95% on-time delivery rate** across all projects.

- Created RESTful APIs and integrated **gRPC** to enable efficient communication between services, adhering to **OpenAPI** standards to ensure seamless integration.

- Developed engaging user interfaces with **React (18)**, **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind CSS**, enhancing user experience across financial dashboards with a **20% increase** in user satisfaction scores.

• Engineered Machine Learning features including personalized recommendations using **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, improving product visibility and boosting conversion rates by **15%**.
